attributes.action: Bring back Her Majesty's Royal Yacht Britannia to promote the UK post brexit
attributes.additional_details: Between 1991-1995 it helped raise over £3 billion in trade. It also gives the UK government a mobile trade office which can travel anywhere in the world and will provide a powerful statement about our intentions in the new post brexit world. What other country has this ability and history to make it work?
attributes.background: The UK is coming up to an important time in history post brexit and the need to advertise what's great about Great Britain is so important. What's better than having a historically important ship sailing round the world drumming up business and showing we are actively looking for new trade deals
